content: lion brand pattern # 10165 20162 *cwe-hexscarf pdf* skill level easy + level 3 wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 2 balls each *blue mist & dark rose heather * *materials are sufficient to make both items in the set* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers gauge each scarf motif measures 6 inches 15 cm from point to point scarf motifs are joined as the work progresses finish with crocheted border in contrast color instructions include hat with flower *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
